markdown:
Treerazer, the self-styled Lord of the Blasted Tarn, is a powerful demon on the cusp of ascending to the true power of one of the rulers of the Outer Rifts itself—a demon lord. For now, even as a nascent demon lord, Treerazer is a dangerous foe. Treerazer rarely leaves his swampy realm of Tanglebriar—a large thicket of tainted foliage and rotting detritus just south of Kyonin's Fierani Forest— but can be encountered anywhere within that toxic mire, often accompanied by a small legion of demons, corrupted fey, and other deadly allies. Certain occult rituals have the power to call him forth from Tanglebriar, granting him the opportunity to directly work his evils beyond the realm to which he has been exiled. Some believe that no eldritch force contains Treerazer and that, were he willing, he could travel Golarion with impunity, spreading the twisted blessings of his touch and the corruption of his presence, yet the Lord of the Blasted Tarn is as cunning and canny as he is deadly, and prefers to work his evils on the world from the safety of his nightmare realm. **[Recall Knowledge - Fiend](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=46)): DC 60 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 58 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 55 [Treerazer](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3218) **Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 328 1.1 **Perception** +46; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59), [_truesight_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1727) **Languages** [Chthonian](/Languages.aspx?ID=114), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Elven](/Languages.aspx?ID=4), [Fey](/Languages.aspx?ID=119); [telepathy](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=79) 300 feet **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +40, [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +38, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +45, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +46, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +49, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +38, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +45, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +40 **Str** +12 **Dex** +9 **Con** +11 **Int** +7 **Wis** +8 **Cha** +8 **Items** [_Blackaxe_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=490) --- **AC** 54 **Fort** +42 **Ref** +40 **Will** +43 **HP** 550 , regeneration 50 (deactivated by [holy](/Traits.aspx?ID=517)) **Immunities** [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=571) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=578), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=647), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=669) **Resistances** [acid](/Traits.aspx?ID=524) 20, [cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=555) 15, [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=604) 15, physical 20 (except [cold iron](/Equipment.aspx?ID=375)) **Weaknesses** holy 20 **Aura of Corruption** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=542), [plant](/Traits.aspx?ID=668), [primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=676)) 120 feet. Plants near Treerazer twist, deform, and transform into thorny or fungoid parodies of their natural shapes. A living creature in this area must succeed at a DC 47 Fortitude save each round or become partially transformed into plantlike matter. Those who fail this saving throw are treated as if they were [plants](/Traits.aspx?ID=668) for the purposes of any effect that particularly harms or inconveniences plant creatures more than other creatures, but do not gain any benefits of being plant creatures. This effect lasts as long as the creature remains within the area of corruption and for 1 minute thereafter.
**[Reactive Strike](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=48)** --- **Speed** 60 feet, fly 60 feet, swim 40 feet; [_unfettered movement_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1732) **Melee** _Blackaxe_ +47 ([Acid](/Traits.aspx?ID=3), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), [Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194), [Unholy](/Traits.aspx?ID=521)), **Damage** 5d12+18 slashing plus 1d6 acid (plus an additional 2d6 slashing to plants) **Melee** jaws +45 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), [Unholy](/Traits.aspx?ID=521)), **Damage** 5d10+20 slashing **Primal Innate Spells** DC 49, attack +43 - **Cantrips (9th)** [Telekinetic Projectile](/Spells.aspx?ID=334) - **2nd** [Telekinetic Maneuver](/Spells.aspx?ID=333) (at will) - **3rd** [Earthbind](/Spells.aspx?ID=94) (at will) - **4th** [Unfettered Movement](/Spells.aspx?ID=1732) - **6th** [Tangling Creepers](/Spells.aspx?ID=331) (at will) - **9th** [Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78) (at will) - **10th** [Desiccate](/Spells.aspx?ID=1484), [Freeze Time](/Spells.aspx?ID=1538), [Wall of Thorns](/Spells.aspx?ID=366) - **Constant (8th)** [Truesight](/Spells.aspx?ID=1727) **Rituals** DC 49 - **1st** [Demonic Pact](/Rituals.aspx?ID=142) - **5th** [Planar Servitor](/Rituals.aspx?ID=120) **Defoliation** ([Plant](/Traits.aspx?ID=125), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134), [Unholy](/Traits.aspx?ID=521)) Treerazer exudes a pulse of sickly green light in a 30-foot-radius emanation. All plants in the area (including creatures under the effect of his aura of corruption) blacken and wither. Non-creature plants immediately wither and die. [Plant](/Traits.aspx?ID=668) and [fungus](/Traits.aspx?ID=614) creatures take 20d8 void damage with a DC 49 basic Fortitude save. A creature that fails its save is [doomed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=67) for 1 minute and [sickened 3](/Conditions.aspx?ID=91). Treerazer can choose to exclude any number of plants or fungi in the area from this effect, and generally does so to preserve twisted and corrupted plants or fungi, or plant and fungus creatures that are allied to his cause. Treerazer can't use Defoliation for 1d4 rounds. **Dispelling Strike** ([Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134)) **Frequency** once per round; **Trigger** Treerazer hits a creature, object, or spell effect with a weapon Strike or subjects one to Defoliation; **Effect** Treerazer casts his innate [_dispel magic_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1493), targeting the creature he hit with his Strike or one spell affecting that creature. **Staggering Strike** When Treerazer scores a critical hit with a melee attack, the target is [stunned 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=93).
Spawn Of Cyth-V'sug Treerazer was once the favored minion and lieutenant (some even say child) of the demon lord [Cyth-V'sug](/Deities.aspx?ID=74), Lord of Fungus and Parasites. After a failed attempt to wrest that role in the [Outer Rifts](/Planes.aspx?ID=45) away from Cyth-V'sug, Treerazer fled to the mortal [Universe](/Planes.aspx?ID=26). Cyth-V'sug was unable (or perhaps only unwilling) to pursue but took steps to ensure that Treerazer would remain there by exiling him, severing Treerazer's bond to the Outer Rifts—if the Lord of the Blasted Tarn is slain, his animus will not return to the Outer Rifts and reform. Death, to Treerazer, is a permanent thing.
Treerazer's Cultists Treerazer is worshipped by cultists throughout the Inner Sea region. The majority of these can be found within or near the expanse of the Tanglebriar, consisting of fungus-corrupted fey, debased elves, or other sinister demon worshippers. Beyond Tanglebriar, his cultists are rarer and tend to be loners or leaders of very small groups. Treerazer's religious symbol is a bleeding dead tree that's been split in half. **Areas of Concern** corruption of nature, pollution, and slaughter of elves
**Edicts** corrupt plant life with evil or fungal influences, slay elves, feast on rotten flesh or fungus
**Anathema** grant mercy to elves, plant trees, encourage natural plant growth
**Divine Attribute** Strength or Wisdom Devotee Benefits **Cleric Spells** 1st: [_grim tendrils_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1548), 3rd: [_wall of thorns_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1752), 6th: [_tangling creepers_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1714)
**Divine Font** [_harm_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1552) or [_heal_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1554)
**Divine Sanctification** must choose unholy
**Divine Skill** [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=43)
**Domains** [destruction](/Domains.aspx?ID=71), [nature](/Domains.aspx?ID=85), [nightmares](/Domains.aspx?ID=86), [tyranny](/Domains.aspx?ID=96)
**Favored Weapon** [greataxe](/Weapons.aspx?ID=376)
name: Treerazer
resistance_raw: acid  20,  cold  15,  fire  15, physical 20 (except  cold iron )
